body.name: Erduoduo 3 Pack Mini Broom and Dustpan Set - Small Dustpan and Brush Set，Mini Dust Pan Tool for Table, Desk, Countertop, Key Board
features: Mini Broom and Dustpan Set size is 7.5 x 4.5 inches,mini size saving space
Pack of 3 set mini broom and dustpan set, Green & Grey blue& Pink
The brush can be embedded in the dustpan, Hangs or stands for easy storage - dustpan set was adorable,Keep your broom and dustbin together
Hand broom and dustpan set size is perfect for children’s dinner time, or it can be an ideal gift for children to train their habit of cleaning things
The soft, portable dustpan brush, with a tiny cleaning broom, is very suitable for cleaning keyboards, cars, tables, countertops, small pets and even children's living environment during mealtimes.
body.description: 3PCS Dust Pans with Brush - Mini hand broom Set Cleaning Tool for Table, Desk, Countertop, Key Board -The mini dustpan and brush set is a perfect tool for cleaning desktops, desk gaps, window gaps, keyboards, sofas, automobiles, corners, and some messes. -Hand broom and dustpan set is deal for cleaning the living environment of small pets, like small dogs, guinea pigs, cats, hedgehogs, hamsters, chinchillas, rabbits and reptiles etc. -It also can be an ideal gift for children to train their habit of cleaning things. Package Includes: 3* broom 3* dustpan 1*soft cleaning cloth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well for rabbit litter!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to scoop my rabbit's litter boxes and it works great for that purpose. I like the firmness of the bristles- allows me to easily pickup the top layer and not have to use pressure and end up picking up the clean litter below.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for car. Brisles came out after a couple of uses.Tried another one, same thing.Would not buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nifty Little helpers
reviews.reviewText: The bristles are firm enough but not harsh and scratchy. They do a good job of sweeping the countertop and sweeping the lint trap in the dryer without scratching the mesh. The bristles don’t seem as though they’ll come loose easily. Good value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's hard to explain, but the dustpan has a bit of a lip, making it difficult to sweep debris into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 pack comes in handy
reviews.reviewText: These are not the best quality but they get the job done and should last a long time if no one steps on one. I keep one in every room for quick pick ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’ so darn cute
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to keep my potting table clean after I’m done I fill my pots. It does a really good job and the size is perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made our cat a very happy kitty
reviews.reviewText: I actually ordered these as we have a cat who loves, and I mean LOVES, the broom. When one of us sweeps the floor, the is there, trying to rub his face against the bristles and purring as loud as he can. Then he throws himself on the floor in the path of the broom and rolls on his back so we can "sweep" his tummy. He follows us as we move from spot to spot and repeats his actions until we are don't sweeping and put the broom up (which makes him cranky). So for Christmas, he got his very own little broom and dustpan that he can make sweet, sweet love to anytime he wants. The brush sets in his cat bed, and he will nuzzle the bristles while purring like a madman until he falls asleep with his check on the broom. This pack came with three, so we put one of the others in the cat tree for him and the other is his dedicated tummy. brusher. Both the broom and dustpan are made well and there's no shedding from the broom. He isn't a chewer, so these brooms should last him a long time. The microfiber cloth got tossed into the household cleaning kit, and the little dustpans will end up being used for something. Most important thing is that his hairy highness loves his gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for spot cleaning guinea pig cages…
reviews.reviewText: These are great for spot cleaning guinea pig liners, it makes a lot of the hairs come out and they are a good size for the job.
